ygData.subject: Re: Women on EQ: Flirting
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a level 41 gnome Rogue on Rathe.  I used to get flirted with a lot but mostly guys talking about how cute I am since I m so tiny, but a fierce little
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a level 41 gnome Rogue on Rathe. I used to get flirted with a lot but
mostly guys talking about how "cute" I am since I'm so tiny, but a fierce
little fighter. I'm married to a wonderful Wood Elf Ranger named Kinien now
and most everyone who knows me knows that I'm married, but my friends still
flirt with me a bit. =) When most people see me they comment on my cuteness
and level, but since I'm not one of the 'sexier' races getting I rarely get
flirted with right away =)
I do get hit with "r u a girl in RL?" a lot though =) Usually by the time they
inspect my equipment and see that wedding ring they realize I'm "off limits"

--Annwyl Anklestabber-Northoak
